name: Rush for gold: Alaska
description: Take part in the famous "Rush for Gold" in Alaska!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: 1000 Mhz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 260 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Nice game (for the price)  Good animations/graphics.  Get it whilst you can. Worth the $
